Morrison doubled, Amburgey scored. Pawtucket 11, RailRiders 8. Today’s game RailRiders (21-19) vs. Pawtucket (16-25), PNC Field, 6:35 p.m. Probable pitchers: RailRiders RHP Raynel Espinal (1-4, 6.49) vs. Pawtucket LHP Matthew Kent (0-1, 9.72) Off the rails ■ IF Cliff Pennington is on the injured list with a hamstring injury, RailRiders manager Jay Bell said. ■ Former New York Mets closer Jenrry Mejia pitched the ninth inning for Pawtucket and allowed one run on two hits. — CONOR FOLEY International League North W L Pct.
